Reviews.Title: Bad Product, Bad Seller
Reviews.Author: buyer1964 "Shopper1967623"
Reviews.Content: Worked for a week. Sent back for replacement. Got same non-working camera back with no note of any kind. Lost money buying the camera and money shipping back for replacement.

ProductInfo.Features:
24 infrared LEDs illuminate up to 65 feet away in the dark
Camera produces images of 420 horizontal lines
Weather-resistant casing for indoor and outdoor use
Color CCD image sensor
Package include: 1 indoor/outdoor night vision camera, 1 power adapter for camera, 1 pack video/power wire, 1 security warning Sticker
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Outdoor CCD CCTV Infrared Weatherproof Bullet Surveillance Camera Night Vision Video 420 TVL 6mm Lens with Bonus Power Supply, Video Power Cable and Free Secuirty Warning Decal 1T1
